name: Arnon Milchan
description:
You might have never heard of Arnon Milchan, but for a good 40 years, he has been a major player in Hollywood. The billionaire has produced over 100 movies. Among them: Once Upon a Time in America, Pretty Woman, JFK, Free Willy, Natural Born Killers, Heat, L.A. Confidential, Fight Club, Big Momma's House, Freddy Got Fingered, Daredevil, Alvin and the Chipmunks, 12 Years a Slave, Gone Girl, Birdman, The Revenant...

On the side, for a good 20 years, Arnon Milchan was a top secret Israeli operative. While making all these Hollywood hits (and not hits), he helped Israel steal technology, acquire arms, build up its nuclear program, and finance its intelligence operations.

Two people who defintenly have heard of Arnon Milchan are Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt. Milchan introduced the couple on the set of another film he produced, Mr. and Mrs. Smith...

Which is a movie about spies. See, it all adds up.
